overview:
Mark is a visionary always looking at ways to provide solutions for the betterment of society.

Mark Johnson brings more than 15 years of leadership in non-profit fundraising, strategic planning and management to his role with Fundster. The concept and business model presented by Fundster reflects Mark’s research into the changes taking place in philanthropy, technology, and corporate social responsibility. In prior roles, Mark pioneered innovative programs that promoted social awareness and giving that helped several secular and non-secular organizations to reposition their outreach efforts with their regional, national, and international goals. Mark’s early professional experience was as an early internet entrepreneur, where in 1994 he developed a global e-commerce site which enjoyed online sales from around the world.
